com.vub.model

Class CourseTeacherAssociation

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vub.model.CourseTeacherAssociation

  • @Entity
public class CourseTeacherAssociation
extends java.lang.Object
    Association object which resides between a CourseComponent and a Teacher (User). This association keeps both the User, the Teacher, and possible data which is unique in every relationship (e.g. the role - assistant or professor)
    Author:
    Sam, Nicolas

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CourseTeacherAssociation.TeachingRole
      Every role the teacher can take in a relation between a courseComponent and a user (the teacher).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CourseTeacherAssociation()
      Constructor that makes an empty association.
      CourseTeacherAssociation(CourseComponent courseComponent, User user, CourseTeacherAssociation.TeachingRole teachingRole)
      Constructor that makes an association between courseComponent and user and initializes both ID fields.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CourseTeacherAssociation

        Constructor that makes an empty association.

      • CourseTeacherAssociation

        public CourseTeacherAssociation(CourseComponent courseComponent,
                        User user,
                        CourseTeacherAssociation.TeachingRole teachingRole)
        Constructor that makes an association between courseComponent and user and initializes both ID fields.
        Parameters:
        courseComponent - is the component from the course that is teached.
        user - is the teacher that teaches the courseComponent.
        teachingRole - is an enumeration of TeachingRole.
